data.blankContent: Nurse sharks are very active during the night. In ____ to ____ near ____ bottom, the Nurse shark ____ move ____ on ____ sea ____, ____ its ____, ____ pectoral ____ as ____. Large juveniles and adults are usually found around deep coral reefs, and rocky areas at depths of up to 3-75 meters (10-246 feet) during the daytime, and then they migrate into shallower waters of less than 20 meters (66 feet) deep after darkness.

Large juveniles and adults are usually found around deep coral reefs, and rocky areas at depths of up to 3-75 meters (10-246 feet) during the daytime, and then they migrate into shallower waters of less than 20 meters (66 feet) deep after darkness.
data.fullContent: Nurse sharks are very active during the night. In addition to swimming near the bottom, the Nurse shark can move around on the sea floor, using its flexible, muscular pectoral fins as limbs. Large juveniles and adults are usually found around deep coral reefs, and rocky areas at depths of up to 3-75 meters (10-246 feet) during the daytime, and then they migrate into shallower waters of less than 20 meters (66 feet) deep after darkness.
data.answer: 护士鲨在夜间非常活跃。除了在海底附近游泳外，护士鲨还能用它灵活、肌肉发达的胸鳍作为四肢在海底四处游动。大型的幼鲸和成年鲸通常在珊瑚礁深处和水深3-75米(10-246英尺)的岩石区被发现，然后在天黑后它们会迁移到不到20米(66英尺)深的较浅水域。
